abilities.name: Magic Evens
abilities.effect: If Mr. Mime ex would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to Mr. Mime ex if that damage is 20, 40, 60, 80, 100, 120, 140, 160, or 180.

attacks.name: Breakdown
attacks.effect: Count the number of cards in your opponent's hand. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pok√©mon.
